author: jwoolley
msg: PS: I still question the copying of the mmap data into the pool in
pool_setaside()... it seems to me that it's easy for that to accidentally
copy a very large file in its entirety into memory.  What am I missing?

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add the "new" perm argument to apr_dbm_open.

author: jwoolley
msg: Another step in my mission to get rid of unnecessary callocs... there
are none left in the buckets code, but I'll bet there are others out

author: jwoolley
msg: The bucket_foo_create() functions do not need to use calloc() because
all of the members of the apr_bucket struct are always explicitly
initialized anyway... malloc() should be used instead.
